mapper.select: select e.exp_num, e.user_num,e.exp_name,e.exp_start_date,exp_end_date, e.exp_price,e.exp_region,e.exp_category,e.exp_capacity, e.exp_ad_state,e.exp_summary_img,e.exp_detail_img, e.exp_view_cnt,e.exp_ad_state, o.order_cnt, r.rev_star from experience e left join order_board o on e.exp_num = o.exp_num left join review r on e.exp_num = r.exp_num where e.exp_category = #{exp_category} and substr(e.exp_region,1,2) in (#{exp_region},#{exp_name}) order by ${exp_ad_state}
